mapper.insert: insert into receivedOrder (roCode, roEmpId, cusCode, productCode, roCount, roPrice, roDate, shipSdate, shipDate, roStatus) values(CONCAT('RO', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d%H%i%s')), #{roEmpId}, #{cusCode}, #{productCode}, #{roCount}, #{roCount}*(SELECT productPrice FROM product WHERE productCode = #{productCode}), #{roDate}, #{shipSdate}, #{shipDate}, #{roStatus})
mapper.select: select a.roCode, a.cusCode, b.cusName, a.productCode, c.productName, a.roCount, a.roPrice, a.roDate, a.shipSdate, a.shipDate, a.roStatus, a.roEmpId, d.EmpName as roEmpName from receivedOrder a left join customer b on a.cusCode = b.cusCode left join product c on a.productCode = c.productCode left join employees d on a.roEmpId = d.empId where a.roStatus != '삭제' order by a.roCode desc
